page.title: 14JOB SURVEY - FARNBOROUGH
page.content:
We have done a survey of the children in Mayfield Junior School to find out where their parents work. We went round to all the classes in the school and asked the children where their parents work.We made a chart to show where the parents work.This is what we found out-
{FATHERS MOTHERS TOTAL {LONDON} 30 8 38 {WOKING }6 1 7 {FRIMLEY }10 21 31 {CAMBERLEY }25 12 37 {ALDERSHOT } 18 7 25 {FARNBOROUGH } 44 59 103
This chart shows that although quite a lot of fathers work in London most of the fathers work locally.
